# Contract Award Request
[title]: Precipitation Gauge Antifreeze
[reference number]: WS4080559762-Doc4088072782

## Solicitation Details
*   Solicitation Number: WS4080559762
*   Publication Date: July 9, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: August 18, 2023, 14:00 (EST)
*   Amendment Date: August 16, 2023
*   Expected Contract Start Date: September 12, 2023

## Procurement Information
*   Category: Goods
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   Trade Agreements: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement

## Contract Details
*   Regions of Delivery: Toronto
*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   End-User Entity: Department of the Environment (ECCC)

## Contact Information
*   Contact Name: Jeong, Hannah (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Contact Email: hannah.jeong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   Contact URL: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16811197?extsite=MTY4MTExOTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

## Bid Requirements
*   Bidders must submit their bid and all required supporting documentation by August 18, 2023, at 14:00 (EST).
*   Late bids will be declared non-responsive.
*   This solicitation is for Precipitation Gauge Antifreeze. [1]

Important Details:

*   Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time.
*   All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the tender closing date at 14:00 hours EST.

 The bid received via email ( hannah.jeong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) or attached files must have the following details:
    *   Bidder's Name, Address and Telephone number
    *   Bidder's Identification number
    *   Information of goods and the price
    *   Bid opening time to be finalized
